TI_DOC.P: EIB - Projektering og opførelse af rensningsanlæg (BA-Orasje)

STI_DOC.P: Promoter: Orašje Municipality, Bosnia and Herzegovina — no 01-23-1173/15
Corrigendum
Amendment no 1 to International Invitation for Tenders

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: Contact person: Mrs Ph D RuzaNedic (Head of PIT),

CONTENTS.P: Required submission date of tenders provided in the international invitation for tenders shall be amended and read as follows:

“All bids must be delivered in closed sealed envelopes bearing the mention “Bid for Design and Construction of Kostrc Water Treatment Plant; Orasje” not later than 7.5.2018, 11:00 local time to the address given below. Bids will be opened immediately in the presence of Bidders’ representatives who choose to attend.
The address referred to above is:
